knowledgeArticles.title: How to Handle Protocol Deviation Issues
knowledgeArticles.content: Protocol deviation issues occur when network traffic doesn't conform to expected protocol standards. To troubleshoot: 1) Check network configuration, 2) Verify protocol implementations, 3) Review security policies, 4) Analyze traffic patterns for anomalies.
knowledgeArticles.author: Security Team

knowledgeArticles.title: API Rate Limiting Best Practices
knowledgeArticles.content: Implementing effective API rate limiting: Use sliding window algorithms, implement different tiers (basic/premium/enterprise), provide clear error messages with retry-after headers, monitor usage patterns, and document limits clearly for developers.
knowledgeArticles.author: API Team

knowledgeArticles.title: Database Performance Optimization Guide
knowledgeArticles.content: Database optimization strategies: Create appropriate indexes, optimize query patterns, implement connection pooling, monitor slow queries, partition large tables, and regularly update statistics for query optimization.
knowledgeArticles.author: Database Team

knowledgeArticles.title: Mobile Push Notification Setup
knowledgeArticles.content: Setting up push notifications: Configure FCM/APNS credentials, implement proper token management, handle notification permissions, design notification templates, and test across different devices and OS versions.
knowledgeArticles.author: Mobile Team
